text: Guatteria ramiflora is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to Peru. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Guatteria ramiflora. 2016 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. ramiflora Category:Flora of Peru Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Guatteria ramiflora
